title: Condiments
description: When Timmy is away, the condiments come out to play. Oscar-nominated short that questions the futility of life.
quote: My god! I’m empty! Don’t let him put pencils in me!
altHero: anthropomorphic condiments with a bottle of ketchup riding a jar of horseradish talking to a waffle with glasses
alt1: the ketchup holds up a mustard packet who has been torn and squeezed
alt2: kosher sweet pickles rabbi and mayonnaise priest look concerned
alt3: condiments pretending to be not alive
alt4: empty peanut butter jar with a look of fear and disgust
